Posts.Content:
I am from a different forum, but your question caught my attention. Yes a 17 year old can, but it is highly, highly unlikely that you have cancer. Much more probable that you have a clogged milk duct or maybe a cyst. If I was in your situation I would go to the doc about
 it, just to rule out anything hinky going on.
Posts.Title: can a 17 year old get breast cancer??

prayers
Hugs,

Not to scare you, but get a biopsy. Do not take no it is just a cyst or a node for an answer, more then likely it is just a cyst, but make sure! 
Get a biopsy!
